channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Biden approves national security memo aimed at helping Trump on China, Iran, North Korea and Russia
item.description: President Joe Biden has approved a new national security memorandum that is meant to serve as a roadmap for the incoming Trump administration as it looks to counter growing cooperation among China, Iran, North Korea and Russia.

item.title: Alex Jones keeps Infowars for now after judge rejects The Onion’s winning auction bid
Man accused of killing UnitedHealthcare’s CEO shouts on way into courthouse and fights extradition
